neighborhood_overview: The Grove Street area location of the apartment makes it extremely close to Manhattan via the PATH train. Ferries, a light rail (HBLR) and buses also provide additional access to NYC as well as local spots. The local neighborhood surrounding the apartment is just as interesting as NYC and everyone knows the best views of Manhattan are actually from the Jersey City waterfront (a great place for a stroll, run or photo op). Grove Street is just as convenient as Manhattan in many ways and you will find yourself a short walk from dozens of restaurants, bars and shops. The area boasts several parks (including Liberty State Park with Liberty Science Center as well as access to the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island), ice rinks, Newport Mall (130 stores and a movie theater), boating, and performance venues.. Several farmer’s markets, craft fairs, live outdoor music, holiday events and a midnight foodie market lend to the local vibe. You will also find a huge amount of diversity in Jersey City,

description:
This apartment is professionally managed by Furnished Quarters, the largest independently owned and operated supplier of short-term furnished housing with over 20 years of experience in the industry. The upscale, pet-friendly building’s amenities include a 24-hour attended lobby, fitness center with yoga studio, children's playroom, pool with sundeck, billiards room, lounge and more. The surrounding area of downtown Jersey City is vibrant and historic, with plenty of restaurants, museums, shopping and parks waiting to be explored. The PATH train, located mere steps from the apartment building, provides a 10-20 minute ride into Manhattan.

The space

neighborhood_overview: Jersey City is the second most populous city in the state of New Jersey. Located just across the Hudson River from Lower Manhattan, it’s part of the New York metropolitan area. The city’s architecture ranges from Industrial Age homes to classic brownstones to modern high rises. Downtown Jersey City, a major historical district, overlooks the Manhattan skyline. The waterfront section of the city is nicknamed “Wall Street West” for being home to several employers in the financial services, securities and insurance industries. The lofty office buildings, including the highly distinctive Goldman Sachs Tower, create a stunning skyline. With its proximity to Manhattan, Jersey City is popular among young professionals working in New York City looking for an alternative to living in one of the five boroughs. It is also one of the most ethnically diverse cities in the world, with large populations of Hispanic, Asian and Indian Americans. The Port Authority Trans-Hudson (PATH) train, a 24-hour s
host_about: With 10+ years of experience in the hospitality/corporate housing industry - I began working with Furnished Quarters as VP of Global Solutions in 2011. Since then, they have become one of the largest providers of short-term furnished apartments in the U.S. For over 25 years, Furnished Quarters has provided exceptional experiences with passion, reliability, and integrity. With a wide variety of apartments, we have availability wherever you need!

neighborhood_overview:
Our beautiful garden suite is located on the ground level of a multi family home in a residential enclave right in downtown Jersey City with close proximity to McGinley Square.

Jersey City is the most diverse city in NJ - which means great local food options! Madame Claude Biis, Wurstbar, Brightside Tavern, Liberty House, The Maritime, Surf City Bar, Porta, Ani Ramen, Rasoi, Second Street Bakery, Smorgasborg Harborside JC, East Wind Snack Shop, etc.

Local sights include Liberty State Park, Central Railroad of NJ Terminal, Statue of Liberty, Liberty Science Center, Van Vorst Park, Downtown JC pedestrian plaza w/ restaurants, bars, & shops, White Eagle Hall, and more.

Check out our Guidebook for more recs, or better yet - just ask us!

Who am I? A bit of a renaissance woman whose broad interests defy categorization. With university degrees in philosophy and mathematics, I have held executive positions at major corporations, ad agencies and media associations before launching my own communications consultancy in 2002.  I love to capture life on film or paper and am also a certified yoga instructor, teaching a weekly class to cancer survivors.

Beyond that, I'm down to earth, love jazz, love my city & enjoy exploring the world - preferably on foot, as I'm an avid walker & hike leader, so figured it would be a win/ win to share my lovely apartment with like minded people looking for an affordable home away from home while they are traveling.

neighborhood_overview: Known affectionately as the "sixth borough," Jersey City is staking its claim as a destination in its own right within the New York City metropolitan area. Young professionals, artists and families have flocked to the Jersey side of the Hudson in recent years and have created a city that is both an extension of Manhattan and a place where you can see and feel an authentic Jersey vibe. Visitors to New York City will find that Jersey City not only offers more reasonably-priced accommodations with easy access to the Big Apple, but also noteworthy parks, restaurants, bars and other attractions that will make for a fun and memorable trip.

The Hilltop is a quiet and secluded neighborhood in booming Jersey City. A short walk to the PATH Subway that gets to downtown or midtown Manhattan in less than 20 minutes makes this the perfect spot for business trips, visiting family or taking in all that the NYC Metro has to offer the modern traveler.

The #HilltopHideawayJC is also steps away from Downtown Jersey City, which has blossomed into a destination in and of itself. Nightlife, events, restaurants, museums & parks are at your fingertips and even in a "covid world" there are opportunities to explore and experience.

neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City is in northeastern New Jersey. Its eastern waterfront faces the Hudson River where it meets Upper New York Bay. Liberty State Park has panoramic views of the Manhattan skyline, the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island, the former immigrant gateway. The park’s Liberty Science Center features interactive exhibits, live animals and an IMAX Dome theater. Bars and ethnic eateries line downtown’s Grove Street.
The Jersey City Heights Neighborhood in Jersey City, New Jersey
A residential neighborhood with some Victorian and Edwardian homes, The Heights has multicultural restaurants, cafes, and ice cream shops along Central Avenue. Adjacent to a large reservoir, Pershing Field features an indoor skating rink and swimming pool, while Leonard Gordon Park is known for its early-1900s buffalo and bears statues by sculptor Solon Borglum. Washington Park offers sports courts and a playground.

description:
Located on a quiet, tree lined street with less than 1 minutes walk from the vibrant Grove Street PATH Station, which is open 24 hours and only 5 minutes ride to lower Manhattan and 10 minutes to mid-town Manhattan.

We will provide you with an experience of a home away from home. You will find many of the daily necessities and comfort here, and more to ensure that you enjoy your stay to the utmost.

The space
The entire building was gut renovated in 2015 and this 3rd floor apartment unit is newly furnished for the first time. It has a front main unit with 1 bedroom, full bathroom, living room and a fully equipped kitchen. Across the common hallway to the rear, you will find the sanctuary of a large private 2nd bedroom. Each bedroom is provided with an elegant working desk. All designed with your comfort and functionality in mind.

It also includes high speed internet and cable TV.

Please see photo of floor-layout for more detail

name: Rental unit in Jersey City · ★4.80 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 2 shared baths
description:
Spacious, light-filled room with a big closet for one person. Big bedroom in a shared apartment with 4 other young, clean, professionals. In the fantastic neighborhood of Jersey City Heights. The bus is one and half a block away. Also cheap Uber ride to Hoboken, with direct PATH train to the city. Bathrooms are clean, and WIFI is available throughout. The apartment is equipped with a central heating/cooling system and washer/dryer in the unit.

The space
The apartment is huge and has 5 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The room has a big closet, a nice desk for working, a comfortable full-size bed, a nightstand, and a lamp.

Move in and you're at home. It's that easy! Laundry machine and dishwasher available for your use.

Guest access
You will have sole access to your bedroom. The rest of the apartment is shared.

Other things to note
Cleaners stop by twice a month to clean the common areas of the apartment.
neighborhood_overview: Just across the river from Manhattan, Jersey City is considered the sixth borough of New York City. There are frequent buses to Times Square just a 5 min short walk away from the apartment. Buses run every 10 minutes. There are plenty of local restaurants nearby with diverse and delicious cuisine.

name: Rental unit in Jersey City · 3 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
description:
Amazing 3 bedroom apartment in a historic brownstone steps from the Grove Street PATH train. Two stops into Manhattan! Enjoy your stay in the hottest area in Downtown Jersey City! Everything you need right out your door! This apartment is available for up to a group of five for monthly stays.

The space
Amazing apartment with old world charm, steps to restaurants, stores, outdoor markets, and public transit. Three bedrooms and one bathroom, with a large kitchen area stocked with everything you need to feel at home.
neighborhood_overview: Jersey City is an exciting and charming neighborhood full of tons of activities for everyone. Great restaurants and cafes are just outside the door of the apartment. Regular events take place outside on Newark Ave. Enjoy all Jersey City has to offer!
host_about:
Hi, I'm Miz!

I have lived in the NYC area for 8 years, and have been sharing my space (now spaces!) with guests since 2014. I love hosting!

I grew up in Houston, Texas, went to college in Pennsylvania, and spent time living in Italy, Spain, and Australia before moving to NYC. I currently live in Jersey City.

I am a real estate agent and property manager, and in my spare time I enjoy long walks in the neighborhood, wandering around NYC, all the self-care (massages, facials, yoga), and eating out (plus a good cocktail) with friends. 

I'm an avid traveler and have stayed with friends all over the world. I love to get a local experience when I travel, so I'm happy to provide that for my guests. My partner Mario and I host together, so you may hear or see him as well! 

Any and all questions welcome! I want to make sure you have a great time in Jersey City & NYC.

Because the house is from the 1800s the pipes that go out onto the streets are made of clay and very sensitive if we
neighborhood_overview: McGinley Square is an area of Jersey City that is quickly gaining popularity as a hotspot and is also considered the heart of Jersey City. Located near the middle of the city, south of Journal Square, the “square” itself is at the intersection of two of the city’s major thoroughfares, Montgomery Street and Bergen Avenue. This neighborhood is quickly burgeoning with lots of shops, restaurants, bars — and new places to explore. The McGinley Square Special Improvement District has also helped in boosting this neighborhood, creating a weekly pop-up Pedestrian Plaza on weekends.

Hi! I'm a native New Yorker, (now in neighboring Jersey City) who works in media entertainment, and I travel pretty often. (As often as I can!) I find Air BNB to be a fantastic resource, I used them once in Berlin and was hooked!
I am always a neat and responsible guest and will treat your home as my own while I'm there.  Whenever I travel, the majority of my time in your city will not be spent in the apt., however, it's always nice to have the comfort of a home to come back to.  I enjoy emersing myself into the culture of new places, so please recommend! Let's stay in touch; I also host, and I can do the same when you come to New York City! :)

host_about:
Our names are Kevin Song & David Wang. We are close friends. Both of us immigrate from China to the US and have been living, working, raising families in NYC metropolitan area for almost 30 years.

David works full-time as an IT engineer in a bank, and a real estate investor too.

name: Rental unit in Jersey City · ★4.94 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
Welcome! Are you seeking big city excitement with small town feel? You're in the right place!

This spacious, cozy apartment sits on top of a historic, owner-occupied brownstone that has been updated with your every comfort in mind. We're located on a quaint residential street, in the heart of the city. The apartment is within walking distance of other neighborhoods in Downtown, a 10 minute walk to two PATH stations, and a short 10 minute PATH ride into New York City.

The space
You and your guest(s) have full access to the apartment and amenities. The apartment includes bedroom with seating and work areas, kitchen with dining area, and bathroom. The apartment is fully-furnished with a living area featuring king size bed and futon with all linens, built-in closet, dresser, Samsung TV, Apple TV, Bose sound bar, xBox Series X, and standing desk with ergonomic chair; fully-equipped kitchen with stove/oven, refrigerator/freezer, microwave, Keurig, and 4 per
neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City is part of Hudson County’s “Gold Coast,” a cluster of cities on the west bank of the Hudson River, located in NJ across from New York City. Jersey City is surrounded by other bustling urban areas – including NYC, Hoboken, and Weehawken. For a multi-city tour, hop on the PATH for a quick, 10 minute ride into our neighboring cities. Looking to check out the rest of the Gold Coast? Take the Light Rail up and down the Gold Coast into The Heights, McGinley Square, and Journal Square Jersey City; Hoboken, Weekhawken, and other notable cities/townships in Hudson County.

Want to stay closer to home? Downtown Jersey City is very walkable! We’re located right in Downtown, which is made up of many neighborhoods – all within walking distance of each other. From the the historic neighborhoods of Hamilton Park, Harsimus Cove, Powerhouse Arts District, The Village, and Van Vorst Park in Historic Downtown; to the modern neighborhoods of Exchange Place, Paulus Hook, and The Water

I love traveling, new experiences, and meeting new people.

description:
This 3-bedroom home boasts a crisp, contemporary feel while still feeling comfortable and inviting. Enjoy a convenient kitchenette, queen size beds, Smart TVs & fast Wifi. Parking available upon request. Laundry available in building. A perfect weekend getaway for a big group of family or friends to visit NYC & Jersey City.
✦ 4mins walk to the Light Rail station
✦ 30 mins to Manhattan with public transportation
✦ 7mins drive to Liberty State Park where you can enjoy the BEST NYC skyline view

The space
This apartment is locate on the second floor (one level above the ground), has three bedrooms and each has a queen-size bed. One bathroom. Fast Wifi, Two smart TVs, one in the living room the other one is the big bedroom. Driveway parking available upon request, laundry in the building. Bedding and towels provided.
neighborhood_overview:
You can't see the view of the NYC skyline from the city itself. The best spot is from Jersey City. We are only 7mins drive away from the ‎Liberty State Park which is voted #1 best Manhattan view in Jersey City! Enjoy a relaxing dinner at the Liberty House Restuarant with iconic views of the NYC skyline, Ellis Island, and Lady Liberty.

Within 5 mins by drive, there are also a local brewery and a cocktail bar/distillery open until midnight.

Our residential neighborhood is an urban-suburban mixed feel with easily accessible public transportation. The neighbors around are friendly. It is also safe and quiet at night.

We have one security camera on the front porch and one facing the garage. They will be on during your stay. Parking peace of mind all time!
host_about:
Hello! My name is Amy! I’m a business owner in nyc. I love New York City because it is beautiful, diverse, and full of possibilities. I definitely love travel and I enjoy observing people living in different places with different lives. 

I hope you can experience a local New Yorker’s life in my place!

host_about:
Hello, and welcome to our home. My husband and I would be so happy to host you in our newly constructed Jersey City condo. We both share a huge passion for travel, and we have been blessed to live and visit many places all over the world. Chris and I decided to root ourselves in the city that has so much to offer which is Jersey City. While settling here, we decided to give our fellow travel lovers a place that feels like home. With southern hospitality in our roots, we have a deep love for hosting, and we look forward to extending that love and warmth to our new friends.
Our modern, sun-drenched condo offers a tranquil vibe, which is perfect to come home to after a long day of exploring the city. This location is perfect for families who want to visit Jersey City  or New York area. The location is prime for any sports enthusiasts as we are a quick fifteen-minute drive to MetLife stadium—home of the New York Giants and New York Jets. The area is also suited for travel healthcare professionals, as we are near many hospitals including Jersey City hospital. Newark international airport is a quick twelve-minute drive and in thirty minutes you are in the BIG APPLE! New York City.

1 bed/1 bath private unit with private entrance and deck in a two family home in the Bergen Lafayette section of Jersey City. Good for 1-2 adults only.

description:
Recently renovated, beautifully furnished garden level apartment in downtown Jersey City. Enjoy the peace, quiet and safety of the apartment’s residential street or explore the restaurants and shops of Newark Ave just a block away. Also a 10-minute walk from the PATH which takes you to downtown Manhattan (World Trade Center) in 7 minutes and to midtown Manhattan (33rd St and 6th Ave) in 19 minutes. 20 minute drive to Newark Liberty International Airport

The space
Welcome to your retreat from a day out in the city! We have lived in Jersey City for over 10 years and are excited you will be spending some time exploring the area. We love to travel and know what makes for a great stay; we strive to provide the same to you.

The apartment is on two levels. You enter on the first level into the cozy living room. The sofa is comfortable and pulls out into a queen-size bed outfitted with a premium high-density foam mattress for a great night’s sleep. There is an
neighborhood_overview:
Downtown Jersey City is an excellent place to explore in its own right. Within a 15 minute walk you will find more than 30 excellent restaurants including Razza (the best Pizza in NYC, according to the NY Times), Taqueria Downtown (best tacos in NJ, according to us!) and cuisines from all over the world. We also have a thriving art scene with lots of street art; ask Kevin for tips =)
It's only a 20 min walk to the waterfront at Exchange Place where you will have jaw dropping views of Manhattan across the river; there are a few excellent dining options there as well such as Hudson & Co, Lokal JC and DomoDomo.
host_about: Aneliya and I are always looking for interesting conversation and enjoy sharing our home with others. She’s originally from Pleven, Bulgaria while I’m a city boy from Caracas, Venezuela. We’ve lived in Jersey City for 11 years and are very glad to give suggestions on where to eat, drink, etc.

neighborhood_overview: A suburbia-in-the city setting located on the south west perimeter of New Jersey Route 440 along Newark Bay, and borderline Jersey City.  Community consist of tree lined streets featuring Colonial, Cape Cod, and Ranch Styles homes. Area offers the convenience of city-living with an out of town feel. A short 15 minutes drive or Uber/Lyft ride from Newark International Airport.  Over the past twenty years, Jersey City and most recent Bayonne food scenes have exploded. From Thai to Mexican to Lebanese, multicultural influences have elevated both cities to a diverse and innovative foodie paradise. So whether you’re looking for an Indian restaurant or in the mood for Italian food, you’re guaranteed to find something to satisfy your tastebuds. From seafood to pasta to salad, breakfast, brunch, lunch, or dinner, both Jersey City and Bayonne got it all.

host_about:
Hi!,
We are Hassan and Patricia: a young entrepreneurial couple with big hearts and even bigger dreams. On a day to day, Hassan works in the historic Waldorf Astoria as a Concierge Manager while I [Patricia] work as a residential Interior Designer throughout NYC. This past year we decided to purchase our first home in Jersey City, ( just a hop and skip away from our hometown of NYC) and, naturally, we are bringing along our Airbnb community on this new venture. 

We look forward to meeting you !

Hassan and Patricia

host_about:
I'm an easy-going guy who loves to travel and enjoy the world around him. I often travel for work, thus leaving my apartment available to guests visiting the area (JC, NYC, Newark, etc). I joined AirBnB as it seemed to be a perfect fit for my lifestyle and the flexibility in which it offers as both a guest and a host.

For fun, I enjoy pretty much any of the performing arts, particularly theater, music, and improv comedy. I love movies - way too many to starting naming specific titles but I will say the Lord of the Rings and Harry Potter series (books & movies) changed my life. 

I'm a big believer in kindness and consideration. The golden rule: "treat others the way you wish to be treated." I feel the same way about my belongings and those of others. : )

Our property is located in Jersey City within two minutes of the Light Rail, which can connect you to The Liberty Science Center, Liberty State Park, Hoboken, and Manhattan. The guests' spaces include one private bedroom with natural light a full bed, Roku TV, and desk space. Shared spaces include a complete eat-in kitchen, 1.5 bathrooms, and a comfortable living room. Additionally, wifi access will be made available. Hope to see you soon!

Other things to note
Just a 17 Minute drive from Newark Liberty International Airport. 30 minutes to downtown Manhattan by public Transit.
host_about:
Hi!,
We are Hassan and Patricia: a young entrepreneurial couple with big hearts and even bigger dreams. On a day to day, Hassan works in the historic Waldorf Astoria as a Concierge Manager while I [Patricia] work as a residential Interior Designer throughout NYC. After hosting for a combined seven years on Airbnb, we have fallen in love with the community that this platform facilitates and are very proud of earning our Superhost badge as we truly put a lot of care into providing our guests with a comfortable home away from home. 

This past year we decided to purchase our first home in Jersey City, ( just a hop and skip away from our hometown of NYC) and, naturally, we are bringing along our Airbnb community on this new venture. 

We look forward to meeting you !

Hassan and Patricia

name: Boat in Jersey City · 2 bedrooms · 4 beds · 2 baths
description:
Looking for a unique stay right near New York City? My yacht can sleep up to five people comfortably. Boat has a kitchen, 2 bathrooms each with a shower, closets, drawers, TV, Wifi, hot water — many comforts of home. The marina has many amenities -- restaurants, bars, bathrooms/showers, etc., and there is a ferry to Manhattan nearby. The train also nearby. Downtown NYC in 20 mins. Spectacular views of NY harbor, the Statue of Liberty, etc. Lots of space for jogging/exercising nearby.

The space
This is a private boat parked in a marina. The yacht is like a small house on water and you should be quite comfortable there. Extended stays are also welcome. It is a unique space and very close to Manhattan NYC. Safe and convenient location. One parking space included with your rental. There is some nice outdoor space as well on this boat -- a rear covered patio with outdoor furniture. There is also a front deck where you can sit and relax or sunbathe if the weather is

name: Rental unit in Jersey City · ★4.96 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally located brownstone cozy 1-Bedroom in hip Downtown Jersey City. Newly renovated apartment is located in a safe, quiet residential area - two blocks from everything including great neighborhood restaurants, farmer's market and easy street parking. It's also close to Grove Street Path, affordable option for enjoying lower Manhattan within 10-15 easy minutes.

The space
It’s a garden level 1 bedroom apartment in the brownstone building in the Historic District of Downtown Jersey City.

Guest access
You will have a fully private access to the entire apartment. Urban environment with everything walkable.

Street parking is available, however, on street parking in most of Jersey City requires a residential zone parking permit.

You are encouraged to acquire your temporary parking permit by visiting the Jersey City Parking Authority (JCPA) at 394 Central Ave with your printed AirBnB
neighborhood_overview: Van Vorst Park is a neighborhood in the Historic Downtown of Jersey City, Hudson County, NJ centered on a park sharing the same name. The neighborhood is located west of Paulus Hook and Marin Boulevard, north of Grand Street, east of the Turnpike Extension, and south of The Village and Christopher Columbus Drive. Much of it is included in the Van Vorst Park Historical District.

neighborhood_overview: Jersey City is in northeastern New Jersey. Its eastern waterfront faces the Hudson River where it meets Upper New York Bay. Liberty State Park has panoramic views of the Manhattan skyline, the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island, the former immigrant gateway. The park’s Liberty Science Center features interactive exhibits, live animals and an IMAX Dome theater. Bars and ethnic eateries line downtown’s Grove Street.

name: Home in Jersey City · ★4.69 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 shared bath
description:
Come and experience Jersey City whether you’re in town for business, school or pleasure. A nice and private cozy room will be available to you. The living room, kitchen and bathroom will be shared. Near New Jersey City University, Saint Peter’s College, Jersey City Medical Center, Liberty State Park, Katyn Memorial, Ellis Island, Downtown Jersey City, Newport Mall, local eateries and so much more. Great location to access popular landmarks all year round!

The space
This is a beautiful space with 3 bedrooms and 1 bath. The living room, kitchen and bathroom will be shared. Kitchen is stocked with dishes, silverware, pots, pans, coffee bar, fridge, and a stove. For your convenience and enjoyment the home has 3 Flat Screen smart TV’s & free WiFi.

Guest access
We love to walk and bike around here. If you’re not up for walking you can rent a Citi bike. Free street parking available, however street parking is limited after 4pm!

neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City Heights, often simply called The Heights, is a pleasant, somewhat densely packed residential neighborhood in the northern section of Jersey City, which in turn is the second-largest city in the state of New Jersey.

Homes in the area can be most often found in the two- and three-family detached houses which sit on small lots and which dominate the housing stock here, or in the low-rise apartment buildings that also are a considerable presence in the neighborhood. There are also more than a few stately old Victorian and Edwardian houses scattered throughout the streets of the Heights with rental apartments within, especially on Sherman Place and Summit Avenue.

Rental apartments in The Heights are generally considered to be located in the area that's bordered to the south by the Bergen Arches rail tracks and The Divided Highway (also known as the Pulaski Skyway, or Route 139); to the east by Palisade Avenue (and the city of Hoboken); to the north by Patte

As an avid traveler, I enjoy providing others with an affordable and comfortable place to stay.  Thank you so much.

name: Rental unit in Jersey City · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this cozy Jersey City furnished one-bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and roomy living room. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that New Jersey has to offer! (ID #NYC729)

The space
As with any Blueground apartment, you’ll find a thoughtfully designed space complete with beautiful furniture and a fully-equipped kitchen in this one-bedroom property. And, thanks to our superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and towels, you can relax knowing you’ll always feel comfortably at home. When you’re ready for some fun, you can take in the New Jersey vibes or bring the entertainment to you with the premium wireless speaker or smart TV. This apartment also offers in-floor laundry.

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this one-bedroom include an on-site:

- Dryer on floor
- Elevator
- Washing machine on floor
neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is located in Jersey City, just across the Hudson River from Lower Manhattan.  Jersey City’s bustling waterfront is so  packed with office tours that it is affectionately known as “Wall Street West” among locals. In all, more than 100,000 people are employed within the city. Jersey City is home to its own  thriving international dining scene, including a number of fantastic Vietnamese restaurants and James Beard Award semifinalist Rick Easton’s Bread & Salt Bakery, where you can try some amazing Roman-style pizza. There are also plenty of shops around Journal Square and Newport Centre, a shopping mall located in nearby newport. Jersey City has excellent public transportation, with both express and local buses and a light rail system. The entire area is well connected to Manhattan via NJ Transit’s PATH train system, which runs 24/7 between several stops in Jersey City and 33rd Street and the World Trade Center in  Manhattan.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

Even better? You can enhance your stay with car rentals, grocery delivery, laundry services, and more through our special partnerships. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

Just across the river from Manhattan, Jersey City is considered the sixth borough of New York City. Bergen-Lafayette is an upcoming, vivid, family-oriented community. Parks, restaurants are nearby.

For anyone who wants fast access to Manhattan, a nice, spacious residential place and a reasonable dwelling price, this is an ideal place to stay.

description:
Enjoy the convenience of this elegant 3BR apartment, located minutes from NYC and in the heart of The Heights, Jersey City. We got the whole family covered with 3 Queen and 2 Full Beds, plus there is a 40” Smart TV (no cable) in every room. Plenty of places to “work from home” with two working desks and a dining table that seats six.

The space
The three bedroom apartment is accompanied by a fully equipped kitchen, including a 4-burner electric stove, oven, microwave, toaster, and a healthy amount of kitchenware, and a single bathroom.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire apartment and the shared backyard. Please note, we do not manage the backyard (i.e. cleaning, supplying furniture, etc) as it is a shared space for the guests/tenants.

host_about:
We are two brothers with undeniable roots in the hospitality industry. With family working in hotels, most of our childhood was spent in a suitcase traveling from city to city and experiencing the best of travel. In fact, the true inspiration behind Sunset Stays was conceived from living in a hotel located on Sunset Blvd in Los Angeles.

Now, we have continued our family tradition by contributing to some of the best travel brands in the world. In our free time, we are true adventure seekers; staying at countless Airbnbs across the globe.

Coupling our background in the hospitality industry and as travelers, Sunset Stays is bringing the most seamless and comfortable experience for your next trip.

Our names are Kevin Song & David Wang. We are close friends. Both of us immigrate from China to the US and have been living, working, raising families in NYC metropolitan area for almost 30 years.

David works full-time as an IT engineer in a bank, and a real estate investor too.

name: Rental unit in Jersey City · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
description:
Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this stylish Jersey City furnished two-bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and spacious living room. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that New Jersey has to offer! (ID #NYC761)

The space
Thoughtfully designed with bespoke finishes, modern furnishings, and a fully-equipped kitchen, you’ll enjoy that “I’m home” feeling with this Blueground apartment. Whether you’re lounging in your stylish living room streaming the latest and greatest entertainment on the smart TV or premium wireless speaker, or getting some well-earned rest on the superior quality mattress with luxury linens, you’ll fall in love with everything this Jersey City apartment has to offer. This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this two-bedroom include an on-site:

- Doorman
- Dryer
- Elevator
neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is located in Jersey City, just across the Hudson River from Lower Manhattan.  Jersey City’s bustling waterfront is so  packed with office tours that it is affectionately known as “Wall Street West” among locals. In all, more than 100,000 people are employed within the city. Jersey City is home to its own  thriving international dining scene, including a number of fantastic Vietnamese restaurants and James Beard Award semifinalist Rick Easton’s Bread & Salt Bakery, where you can try some amazing Roman-style pizza. There are also plenty of shops around Journal Square and Newport Centre, a shopping mall located in nearby newport. Jersey City has excellent public transportation, with both express and local buses and a light rail system. The entire area is well connected to Manhattan via NJ Transit’s PATH train system, which runs 24/7 between several stops in Jersey City and 33rd Street and the World Trade Center in  Manhattan.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

Even better? You can enhance your stay with car rentals, grocery delivery, laundry services, and more through our special partnerships. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

name: Home in Jersey City · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 shared bath
description:
Tucked away from downtown is a carefully curated getaway from the hustle & bustle of city life. Diverse restaurants nearby & massive shopping outlets. We're next to the "Central Park" of NJ, stonethrow away from Ellis Island & Statue of Liberty.

Space is sprinkled with rare tropical plants, brand new SS appliances, rainfall water pressure — a quite space with a lux *hybrid memory foam queen bed* to unwind after a long day. We're a 420-friendly space with access to fresh herb & other goods.

The space
Freshly renovated 2BR with brand new stainless steel appliances, full bathroom with 2 bidets & rainfall shower and well-equipped living room -- unlike an empty, sterile hotel.

The kitchen includes a fullsized fridge, dish rack, sink sprayer, new microwave & stove with a griddle! A perfect chef's kitchen with Le Creuset cast iron & vintage KitchenAid. We also have an air fryer/toaster, instapot, espresso kettle, CBD infuser avaliable.

T
neighborhood_overview:
Off the beaten path but close enough to see the NYC skyline without the noise & troubles of actually being in the city. The West Side/Lincoln Park area is a very safe, family-oriented quite residential area with commercial gems woven in between & conviently located between the PATH train & the NJ light rail (nicknamed the free rail as they rarely check tickets.) Were also sandwiched between all the colleges.

Try the BEC at the Trindadian grocery store, $4 small pizza from 2Good2Go Pompeii Pizza or Westside Shawarma which was voted best halal cart in JC all within a short walk or bike. We're from NYC & we've found this neighborhood more convient than where we've ever lived in New York

Beautiful apartment in the heart of Jersey City. One Path train ride away from the Financial District in NYC. Lots of light and space. Free parking and laundry included.

Bedroom includes a queen size bed. 15 minute walk to Journal Square Path train. Perfect for anyone visiting NYC that is looking for a private apartment.
host_about: I am a graduate who studying at cybersecurity policy.  Since my parents are from Europe, I love traveling to see my family all over Eastern and Western Europe. So far, I have traveled to 20 countries in Europe and would like to visit the small towns and rural areas beyond the mainstream big cities to learn more about the hidden traditions and values that people cherish. If my husband Adam and I stay with you in the future, we look forward to telling you more about our life.

name: Rental unit in Jersey City · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
description:
Our property is a pink themed 3-bedroom apartment. During your stay you will have access to the 2 complete rooms. Our Pink Vybez room has pink boho and Zen like decor. Our Pink Glow room has a Barbie Core aesthetic and neon signs. The living room features Wi-Fi lighting, and a graffiti art lounge vibe. The kitchen is a pink blast from the past with its vintage decor. Every room offers a splash of pink and an edgy photo op to help you create a memorable trip.
35 Mins from NYC/15 Mins from EWR

Guest access
During your booking you will have the whole apartment to yourself. The Apartment has 3 rooms 1 of which is for supplies and storage and is off limits at this time. This listing is for a 2-bedroom apartment.

Other things to note
please note that the guests will have access to 2 rooms in this apartment. The 3rd room is for storage and is off limits to guests.
neighborhood_overview: The JC Pink Spot is located in the center of an up-and-coming neighborhood. It is located 35/40 minutes away from NYC which was particularly important to me. While being on a busy commercial block we are located near various convince stores and shopping centers you may hear street traffic during the day. As well as being minutes away from the night life in both Jersey City, Newark, and Bayonne. There are many attractions we are in proximity to such as the prudential theater, MET Life, Top Golf and American Dream are only 30-45 minutes away. The neighborhood is far from quiet and Surburban. However, those are all of the parts I love as I am and will always be a New York City girl at heart.

neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is quiet and peaceful. Lincoln Park is walking distance, as  are Little India for some of the best curry and Mana Contemporary for a bit of art. The 1873 brownstone is on a dead end street so it’s a quiet respite after a hustle and bustle day in NYC.
host_about:
Hi! I’m from Chicago and I live in Jersey City (Journal Square section) now.  I lived in Manhattan for a few years and when I was able to buy something I chose Jersey City. It’s  a very cool place and is a shorter trip to NYC than most of Brooklyn. I'm listing my place while I do some cosmetic work on the space upstairs (no noisy work).  I also travel quite a bit so I thought I would host. I’ve got a magical and freaky bald dog (I failed at my first time fostering. He never left.) so, of course, your pet is welcome. I’m Ukrainian and plan on signing up for the Airbnb refugee hosting program which I’m very excited about. I’m responsible and chill and like making people feel welcome. 
Good luck with your search!

description:
Welcome to your home away from home! Our hidden gem is perfect for commuting, remote work or just visiting NYC. You'll have everything you need for a wonderful stay.

Our place features a modern urban flair, bright flooring, an open floor-plan layout, plus a paved outdoor patio.

Located only 15mins from Manhattan, this gorgeous home offers convenient access to the best NYC attractions, restaurants, and shops. Experience the city like a local from the comfort of your own, private retreat.

The space
(for corporate rentals, see paragraph below)

Unique "urban jungle" interior, private apartment with open concept full kitchen, eating and living room area, spa-feeling bathroom with walk-in shower, and quiet bedroom with Queen sized bed and light-blocking curtain.

The kitchen has everything you will need for cooking, including a fridge and a full oven, as well as an automated coffee machine ...and of course, we provide you wi
neighborhood_overview:
Perched atop the New Jersey Palisades, you will be staying in the popular Riverview Arts District (Jersey City Heights) overlooking Hoboken and the Manhattan skyline! This neighborhood is becoming a go-to spot for new residents and tourists alike.
A multitude of shops, a plethora of international restaurants, public transport, gyms, and parks are all a short walking distance away.

Oh, did we mention: one of the best NYC skyline views is just a 4 mins walk away from our place! -- but don't tell anyone -- this view spot is a local secret ;)
You can also enjoy yoga in the park, the farmer's market on Saturday and Sunday, and great coffee shops such as the iconic Modcup.
host_about:
Hi, I'm Gabriela, a Software Engineer, with a love for travel!
I travel a loooot for fun and for work, and stayed at many Airbnb's for extended periods of time, so I know how important it is to have the perfect place to call home away from home.

Now, I transitioned to the other side of the experience, as an Airbnb host. I hope to make your stay perfect and have used my own extensive experience to make sure that our place is (and has) everything  you will need while traveling! 

Feel free to reach out any time if you have question before or during your stay :)

neighborhood_overview: 5 mins from NYC Jersey City has a vibrant food scene and was named America's next great food city by Travel and Leisure. Pop into any of the many corner bars throughout this neighborhood. Each bar has a slightly different flavor (though most promise at least a beer and a bite to eat!) and every local swears loyalty to “their” beloved bar. Rising above Jersey City, the Heights boast truly spectacular views of the Manhattan skyline. As the sun sets on Riverview Fisk Park, unobstructed views allow you to take in the full splendor of the city’s lights. The Heights additionally boasts its own lush green fields in Pershing Field Park, aquatic diversions at the Reservoir, fresh adventures through the Riverview Farmers Market or strolls through the Riverview Arts District. The neighborhood is perched atop the New Jersey Palisades, overlooking Hoboken and the Manhattan skyline, Jersey City Heights is becoming a go-to spot for new residents and tourists alike.

description:
Discover the best of New Jersey, with this one-bedroom Jersey City apartment. It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this lavishly Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, spacious living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #NYC784)

The space
Thoughtfully designed with bespoke finishes, modern furnishings, and a fully-equipped kitchen, you’ll enjoy that “I’m home” feeling with this Blueground apartment. Whether you’re lounging in your sophisticated living room streaming the latest and greatest entertainment on the smart TV or premium wireless speaker, or getting some well-earned rest on the superior quality mattress with luxury linens, you’ll fall in love with everything this Jersey City apartment has to offer. This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this one-bedroom include an on-site:

- Doorman
- Dryer
- Elevator<
neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is located in Jersey City, just across the Hudson River from Lower Manhattan.  Jersey City’s bustling waterfront is so  packed with office tours that it is affectionately known as “Wall Street West” among locals. In all, more than 100,000 people are employed within the city. Jersey City is home to its own  thriving international dining scene, including a number of fantastic Vietnamese restaurants and James Beard Award semifinalist Rick Easton’s Bread & Salt Bakery, where you can try some amazing Roman-style pizza. There are also plenty of shops around Journal Square and Newport Centre, a shopping mall located in nearby newport. Jersey City has excellent public transportation, with both express and local buses and a light rail system. The entire area is well connected to Manhattan via NJ Transit’s PATH train system, which runs 24/7 between several stops in Jersey City and 33rd Street and the World Trade Center in  Manhattan.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

Even better? You can enhance your stay with car rentals, grocery delivery, laundry services, and more through our special partnerships. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

neighborhood_overview:
Overlooking Hoboken and the Manhattan skyline is the "Heights" a neighborhood in Jersey City, NJ that's quickly becoming the go-to-spot for tourists. And why not? from Riverview-Fisk Park (nestled between Palisade and Ogden Ave) you can appreciate the views of the Hudson and the Manhattan skyline. For morning risers take a walk to the Park's Observation deck and watch the sunrise on the East over NYC, one of the most serene experiences the Heights has to offer.

Jersey City is the most ethnically diverse city in NJ and the country. This diversity can be found in the large variety of ethnic restaurant that call the Heights their home. Most of the restaurant, bars, coffee shops and parks can be found on Central Avenue with the trendier ones on Palisade Avenue. The neighborhood offers a lot of stores, supermarket, bars, restaurants, coffee shops, and parks all within walking distance.

description:
Enjoy this gorgeous, stylish, and spacious studio w 1 full bathroom for up to 2 people. There is a queen size bed in the studio with an equipped kitchen and dedicated work area. Ideal for a digital nomad or business traveler that need a comfortable and easygoing place to stay. Cheap Uber ride or 15 min walk to Hoboken PATH, with direct train to the city.

The space
Brand new development with plenty of space throughout it. Fully stocked kitchen with queen size bed and dedicated work area. This is ideally placed for a single person coming for work who needs to live comfortably and independently.

**NO washer/dryer, dishwasher and parking in the apt**

Move-in and you're at home. It's that easy!!

neighborhood_overview:
Just across the river from Manhattan, Jersey City is considered the sixth borough of New York City. There are frequent buses to Times Square just a short walk away from the apartment. Buses run every 10 minutes. There are plenty of local restaurants nearby with diverse and delicious cuisine.

House is located in a very beautiful and historic street right above Hoboken. Very easy and accessible location to get anywhere you want to.

name: Home in Jersey City · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 shared bath
description:
No short terms stay!

Smart opportunity for guests who want to visit NYC without paying the overwhelming City prices. Great choice for visitors, business travelers or students.
Fascinating location in Jersey City with short walk to train station: 15 minute subway commute into Manhattan, 10min ride to World Trade Center/10min to Newark Airport. cheap Uber/Lyft rides.
Driving? Precisely 5-10min drive to NYC via Holland Tunnel (normal traffic)

Free street parking.

The space
Brand new furniture. This bedroom has a twin size bed, has a few shelves for storage, TV, a closet and chair if you need to work or organize your stuff.
Basement space for work/study and laundry & dryer available for free use.
Looking for students/ professional, male or female with space sharing respect and responsibility in a quiet creative environment.

Guest access

neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is very quiet and safe. A melting pot of different ethnicities and cultural backgrounds. Beautifully diverse but mainly professionals and full-time workers living in a family community. The courthouse building is across the street with full security 24/7
Security cameras on premises 24/7. Never had any issue or safety situation in the past 10 years that I've lived here. I really love and appreciate our growing community.
host_about:
Hi I am Zack 35 year old man. I am self-employed, working in building my own business  as I do part time in hospitality in NYC and Newark airport. I enjoy painting and gardening.
I  make sure the house is clean and always looks presentable. I have great neighborhood and my house is super comfy and quiet. I would love to host you and make sure you have an enjoyable comfortable and most importantly clean stay. Ask me any question you may have in mind. I love helping by providing the best recommendations around the city, best restaurants and things to do in the area.
I am pretty laid back, I enjoy running (and cooking), gardening, socializing, traveling. I also like to keep a very clean house and respect the environment.

 Looking forward welcoming you :)

neighborhood_overview: A residential neighborhood with some Victorian and Edwardian homes, The Heights has multicultural restaurants, cafes, and ice cream shops along Central Avenue. Adjacent to a large reservoir, Pershing Field features an indoor skating rink and swimming pool, while Leonard Gordon Park is known for its early-1900s buffalo and bears statues by sculptor Solon Borglum. Washington Park and Riverview Park offer sports courts and a playground. Well connected with public transport to downtown Jersey, Hoboken and New York City.

name: Rental unit in Jersey City · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
description:
Show up and start living from day one in New Jersey with this sophisticated two-bedroom Blueground apartment. You’ll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and fully-equipped Jersey City home with stunning balcony views over the city. (ID #NYC881)

The space
Thoughtfully designed with bespoke finishes, modern furnishings, and a fully-equipped kitchen, you’ll enjoy that “I’m home” feeling with this Blueground apartment. Whether you’re lounging in your sophisticated living room streaming the latest and greatest entertainment on the smart TV or premium wireless speaker, or getting some well-earned rest on the superior quality mattress with luxury linens, you’ll fall in love with everything this Jersey City apartment has to offer. This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this two-bedroom include an on-site:

- Doorman
- Dryer
- Elevator
neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is located in Jersey City, just across the Hudson River from Lower Manhattan.  Jersey City’s bustling waterfront is so  packed with office tours that it is affectionately known as “Wall Street West” among locals. In all, more than 100,000 people are employed within the city. Jersey City is home to its own  thriving international dining scene, including a number of fantastic Vietnamese restaurants and James Beard Award semifinalist Rick Easton’s Bread & Salt Bakery, where you can try some amazing Roman-style pizza. There are also plenty of shops around Journal Square and Newport Centre, a shopping mall located in nearby newport. Jersey City has excellent public transportation, with both express and local buses and a light rail system. The entire area is well connected to Manhattan via NJ Transit’s PATH train system, which runs 24/7 between several stops in Jersey City and 33rd Street and the World Trade Center in  Manhattan.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

Even better? You can enhance your stay with car rentals, grocery delivery, laundry services, and more through our special partnerships. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

name: Rental unit in Jersey City · Studio · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
Jersey City Urby is a bustling urban playhouse on the waterfront and minutes from Manhattan via the Exchange Place PATH or nearby ferry. It's everything a high-end, luxury apartment building promises, with way more character and charm. While you may be tempted to spend all of your time exploring our gorgeous building, don't sleep on all of the offerings Jersey City has to offer!

Other things to note
Hop downstairs to DomoDomo for some Michelin-rated Japanese bites, or walk on over to Departed Soles Brewing Company to try a flight of local beers. Take advantage of your proximity to Liberty State Park, and explore gorgeous views of New York Harbor and Lady Liberty herself, and while you're over there check out some of our world-class museums, like Ellis Island or Liberty Science Center.
host_about: Come enjoy easy living at Urby Furnished! Our apartments are the perfect home away from home, with locations in Harrison, Jersey City, and Dallas. We provide top-notch amenities (pool, gym, and co-working spaces, to name a few), gorgeous (and fully-stocked) apartments, and unbeatable locations. Our nightly price includes a fully furnished unit, a parking spot (Harrison and Dallas only), amenity usage, utilities, and Wi-Fi. We also provide linens/towels, dishware, cooking utensils, washer/dryer in unit, etc.

name: Rental unit in Jersey City · ★5.0 · 4 bedrooms · 4 beds · 2 baths
description:
Welcome to this brand-new construction 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom unit. We are excited to host you here!

This unit is on an idyllic street in Jersey City Heights, just a 10 min bus, 7 min Uber, or 20 minute walk to the Hoboken PATH train. Easy commute into NYC while having way more space than in Manhattan or Brooklyn.

We personally occupy the unit above, and take pride in keeping our home a nice place to stay.

Monthly bookings only.

Street parking only, car must be moved for street cleaning.

The space
This is a 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom unit that can host up to five guests. There is a fully-stocked kitchen and a nice-sized living area to enjoy while you stay. Each bedroom has a desk for your work-for-home needs. There are two bathrooms in the units, both with showers. The unit also has a washer and dryer for your use.

Guest access
The guest has access to the 4 bedroom unit.
Guests do not have acce
host_about:
Hi, I'm Miz!

I have lived in the NYC area for 8 years, and have been sharing my space (now spaces!) with guests since 2014. I love hosting!

I grew up in Houston, Texas, went to college in Pennsylvania, and spent time living in Italy, Spain, and Australia before moving to NYC. I currently live in Jersey City.

I am a real estate agent and property manager, and in my spare time I enjoy long walks in the neighborhood, wandering around NYC, all the self-care (massages, facials, yoga), and eating out (plus a good cocktail) with friends. 

I'm an avid traveler and have stayed with friends all over the world. I love to get a local experience when I travel, so I'm happy to provide that for my guests. My partner Mario and I host together, so you may hear or see him as well! 

Any and all questions welcome! I want to make sure you have a great time in Jersey City & NYC.

neighborhood_overview: A residential neighborhood with some Victorian and Edwardian homes, The Heights has multicultural restaurants, cafes, and ice cream shops along Central Avenue. Washington Park offers sports courts and a playground.

neighborhood_overview: Given Jersey City's proximity and accessibility by rapid transit to Manhattan, Jersey City is sometimes referred to as New York City's Sixth borough. Our house is located between Jersey City's top schools - Saint Peter's University and New Jersey City University. There’s a 24 hour 7-eleven and Walgreens 1 minute drive/6min walk from the house.

name: Rental unit in Jersey City · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this stylish Jersey City furnished one-bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and cheery living room. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that New Jersey has to offer! (ID #NYC866)

The space
Gorgeous furniture, fully-equipped kitchen, smart TV, and a premium wireless speaker are just a few of the amenities you’ll find inside this one-bedroom apartment. Ideally located in New Jersey, you’ll find a lot to love outside as well. When you’re ready to relax, you’ll be happy to discover every Blueground bedroom comes with superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and cozy towels. We handle everything so you can simply show up and start living. This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this one-bedroom include an on-site:

- Doorman
- Dryer
- Elevator
- Gym
neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is located in Jersey City, just across the Hudson River from Lower Manhattan.  Jersey City’s bustling waterfront is so  packed with office tours that it is affectionately known as “Wall Street West” among locals. In all, more than 100,000 people are employed within the city. Jersey City is home to its own  thriving international dining scene, including a number of fantastic Vietnamese restaurants and James Beard Award semifinalist Rick Easton’s Bread & Salt Bakery, where you can try some amazing Roman-style pizza. There are also plenty of shops around Journal Square and Newport Centre, a shopping mall located in nearby newport. Jersey City has excellent public transportation, with both express and local buses and a light rail system. The entire area is well connected to Manhattan via NJ Transit’s PATH train system, which runs 24/7 between several stops in Jersey City and 33rd Street and the World Trade Center in  Manhattan.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

Even better? You can enhance your stay with car rentals, grocery delivery, laundry services, and more through our special partnerships. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

Location! Location! Location!
A residential neighborhood with some Victorian and Edwardian homes, The Heights has multicultural restaurants, cafes, and ice cream shops along Central Avenue. Adjacent to a large reservoir, Pershing Field features an indoor skating rink and swimming pool, basketball court, tennis court, and playground. All public transportation is within 12-15 minutes of walking distance. The Heights is one of Jersey City, NJ's safest neighborhoods.

description:
Gorgeous, light filled room with a built-in closet for one person. Cozy bedroom in a shared apartment with 4 other young, clean, professionals. In the fantastic neighborhood of Jersey City Heights. The bus is half a block away. Also cheap Uber ride to Hoboken, with direct PATH train to the city. Bathrooms are very clean, and WIFI is available throughout. LONGTERM stay only (over 28 days)

neighborhood_overview: ust across the river from Manhattan, Jersey City is considered the sixth borough of New York City. There are frequent buses to Times Square just a short walk away from the apartment. Buses run every 10 minutes. There are plenty of local restaurants nearby with diverse and delicious cuisine.
host_about:
Hi, I'm Miz!

I have lived in the NYC area for 8 years, and have been sharing my space (now spaces!) with guests since 2014. I love hosting!

I grew up in Houston, Texas, went to college in Pennsylvania, and spent time living in Italy, Spain, and Australia before moving to NYC. I currently live in Jersey City.

I am a real estate agent and property manager, and in my spare time I enjoy long walks in the neighborhood, wandering around NYC, all the self-care (massages, facials, yoga), and eating out (plus a good cocktail) with friends. 

I'm an avid traveler and have stayed with friends all over the world. I love to get a local experience when I travel, so I'm happy to provide that for my guests. My partner Mario and I host together, so you may hear or see him as well! 

Any and all questions welcome! I want to make sure you have a great time in Jersey City & NYC.

I am a real estate agent and property manager, and in my spare time I enjoy long walks in the neighborhood, wandering around NYC, all the self-care (massages, facials, yoga), and eating out (plus a good cocktail) with friends. 

I'm an avid traveler and have stayed with friends all over the world. I love to get a local experience when I travel, so I'm happy to provide that for my guests. My partner Mario and I host together, so you may hear or see him as well! 

Any and all questions welcome! I want to make sure you have a great time in Jersey City & NYC.

neighborhood_overview:
Downtown is best known and loved for its charming historical architecture. Four of the five historic districts are Downtown where beautiful brownstones beguile along tree-lined streets in Harsimus Cove and around namesake parks in neighborhoods like Van Vorst Park and Hamilton Park.

The condo is located in the downtown section called Paulus Hook. Tucked between Exchange Place and the Colgate Clock along the Hudson River, it is one of the most sought-after historic districts. There, you can find leafy side streets dotted with restaurants, shops, and magnificent brownstones.

Downtown offers the most transportation options with three PATH trains stations and three NY Waterway ferry stops, making the commute to NYC less than 10 minutes. Buses and the Hudson-Bergen Light Rail are accessible as well. Downtown is also the beating heart of the bar, restaurant, and retail scene, but neighborhoods farther out, originally built as suburbs of Jersey City, are just as enlive

neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City, New Jersey, United States

This city is full of history and quaint restaurants and bars that earned it its nickname as “The Wall Street West”. The historic downtown has many million-dollar brownstones and row houses filled with charming historical 1800’s characteristics. Jersey City just recently spent 7 million dollars upgrading its main upscare pedestrian walkway downtown area with all stores and restaurants. A super fast commute to NYC with many restaurants and boutiques: walk to the subway and ride just 5 minutes to NYC World Trade Center.

The house, built in 1856, is located in Downtown Jersey City with a lot to offer: Cafés, Restaurants ( Orale - Mexican cuisine Razza Pizza), Bars (Dullboy, The Ashford), Pharmacies ( CVS, Walgreens, Medly), and just minutes to Hudson River Waterfront Walkway (walk along the water and enjoy stunning views of NYC). Reserve your seat at the Wally Wall, Manhattan Yacht Club's floating clubhouse in the harbor.

name: Rental unit in Jersey City · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this lovely Jersey City furnished one-bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and comfortable living room with great views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that New Jersey has to offer! (ID #NYC945)

The space
As with any Blueground apartment, you’ll find a thoughtfully designed space complete with beautiful furniture and a fully-equipped kitchen in this one-bedroom property. And, thanks to our superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and towels, you can relax knowing you’ll always feel comfortably at home. When you’re ready for some fun, you can take in the New Jersey vibes or bring the entertainment to you with the premium wireless speaker or smart TV. This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this one-bedroom include an on-site:

- Doorman
- Dryer
- Elevato
neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is located in Jersey City, just across the Hudson River from Lower Manhattan.  Jersey City’s bustling waterfront is so  packed with office tours that it is affectionately known as “Wall Street West” among locals. In all, more than 100,000 people are employed within the city. Jersey City is home to its own  thriving international dining scene, including a number of fantastic Vietnamese restaurants and James Beard Award semifinalist Rick Easton’s Bread & Salt Bakery, where you can try some amazing Roman-style pizza. There are also plenty of shops around Journal Square and Newport Centre, a shopping mall located in nearby newport. Jersey City has excellent public transportation, with both express and local buses and a light rail system. The entire area is well connected to Manhattan via NJ Transit’s PATH train system, which runs 24/7 between several stops in Jersey City and 33rd Street and the World Trade Center in  Manhattan.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

Even better? You can enhance your stay with car rentals, grocery delivery, laundry services, and more through our special partnerships. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

neighborhood_overview:
Given Jersey City's proximity and accessibility by rapid transit to Manhattan, Jersey City is sometimes referred to as New York City's Sixth borough. There’s a 24 hour 7-eleven and Walgreens 1 minute drive/6min walk from the house.

name: Rental unit in Jersey City · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
description:
Show up and start living from day one in New Jersey with this beautiful two-bedroom Blueground apartment. You’ll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and fully-equipped Jersey City home with stunning views over the city. (ID #NYC962)

The space
As with any Blueground apartment, you’ll find a thoughtfully designed space complete with beautiful furniture and a fully-equipped kitchen in this two-bedroom property. And, thanks to our superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and towels, you can relax knowing you’ll always feel comfortably at home. When you’re ready for some fun, you can take in the New Jersey vibes or bring the entertainment to you with the premium wireless speaker or smart TV. This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this two-bedroom include an on-site:

- Dryer
- Elevator
- Gym
- Washing machine

Please
neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is located in Jersey City, just across the Hudson River from Lower Manhattan.  Jersey City’s bustling waterfront is so  packed with office tours that it is affectionately known as “Wall Street West” among locals. In all, more than 100,000 people are employed within the city. Jersey City is home to its own  thriving international dining scene, including a number of fantastic Vietnamese restaurants and James Beard Award semifinalist Rick Easton’s Bread & Salt Bakery, where you can try some amazing Roman-style pizza. There are also plenty of shops around Journal Square and Newport Centre, a shopping mall located in nearby newport. Jersey City has excellent public transportation, with both express and local buses and a light rail system. The entire area is well connected to Manhattan via NJ Transit’s PATH train system, which runs 24/7 between several stops in Jersey City and 33rd Street and the World Trade Center in  Manhattan.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

Even better? You can enhance your stay with car rentals, grocery delivery, laundry services, and more through our special partnerships. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

name: Rental unit in Jersey City · ★4.81 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 shared bath
description:
You'll have a great time at this comfortable cozy bedroom in JC with tons of natural light. Spacious private bedroom named Fiji that comes with a queen sized bed, big closet, workspace, and smart TV. High speed internet. It is close to must-see destinations like NYC, Statue of Liberty, Hoboken, Met Life stadium, and more. Bus stop conveniently located right in front of the house. Shared living spaces and kitchen. Room is private and secure with lock and key. A comfortable, budget-friendly stay.

The space
House is centrally located in a great safe location. Private room comes with linens, blankets, and towels. Maximum of 2 guests. Bus stop is conveniently located right in front of the house and can get you to NYC in 30minutes. Or you can take it to Journal Square Path Station in 10 minutes. Your private room will come with lock and key so you can keep your area secure. The rest of house (kitchen, living room, backyard) you will share with others. Maximum of 2 gue
neighborhood_overview:
Given Jersey City's proximity and accessibility by rapid transit to Manhattan, Jersey City is sometimes referred to as New York City's Sixth borough. Redevelopment of the Jersey City waterfront has made the city one of the largest centers of banking and finance in the United States and has led to the district and city being nicknamed Wall Street West. Our house is located between Jersey City's top schools - Saint Peter's University and New Jersey City University.

There’s a 24 hour 7-eleven and Walgreens 1 minute drive/6min walk from the house.
host_about: Hello, my name is Ana & host alongside my husband Josiah. I’m a Senior Program Manager working in Design & Engineering while he works in sports! I was born and raised in Jersey City and was inspired to share the wonder by creating cozy spaces that others can enjoy while experiencing everything this area has to offer. We love meeting new people and our goal is to make you feel at home. We're also huge foodies so we'll definitely share all our recommendations! Hablo español.
